file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-12-04-06 - MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM SPRING ACCUMULATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM SPRING ACCUMULATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 1. General A. The level of hydraulic fluid in the spring accumulator must always be examined before the main door is closed manually. This procedure prevents a free fall of the door when it is opened. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- SPRING-ACCUMULATOR HYDRAULIC- 52-12-04-200-801-A STAIRS DOOR FLUID LEVEL - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-12-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-12-04-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 2. SPRING-ACCUMULATOR HYDRAULIC-FLUID LEVEL - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to examine the level of the hydraulic fluid in the spring accumulator. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 114 114CR Nose hydraulic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Hydraulic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the airstairs door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). (2) Open access door 114CR of the nose hydraulic compartment (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Spring-Accumulator Hydraulic-Fluid Level Indicator (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A CAUTION: IF YOU DO NOT OBEY THE NOTES BELOW, THE MAIN DOOR HINGE SUPPORTS AND ADJACENT STRUCTURE WILL BE VERY MUCH DAMAGED. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-12-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Examine the indicating rod: if it is out, it shows that the accumulator is full; if not, fill as necessary. NOTE: • When the spring accumulator is full, the door can be opened automatically. • When the spring accumulator is empty, the door can be closed manually, but it must also be opened manually. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 114CR of the nose hydraulic compartment (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Close the airstairs door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-12-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
